name: 陳怡靜
objective:
"Chinese" is the course where we make full use of our native languages to enjoy literary works, to enrich our cultural taste, to develop our thinking and even to elevate human cultivation.
This course is for beginners who start learning Chinese. We'll teach from Pinyin, Hanyu Pinyin is our main material to start our pronunciation. We'll take slower tempo for this part to make sure you're steady. Then daily conversation to real life. Listening and speaking are the most skills for this stage.
